Discover Teachers Desc: Browse a diverse selection of verified teachers. Filter by subject, language, and experience to find your match.
Choose the Right Fit Desc: View detailed profiles, ratings, and reviews. Compare and pick the teacher who aligns with your learning style.
Connect & Learn Desc: Start messaging, schedule sessions, and begin your learning journey with confidence on Modaersy.
Modaresy Terms of Service & Platform Rul: Modaresy Terms of Service & Platform Rules
By accessing or using Modaresy, you agre: By accessing or using Modaresy, you agree to abide by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use the platform.
Modaresy is an online platform connectin: Modaresy is an online platform connecting students with private tutors. We offer tools for browsing, filtering, and contacting tutors. However, we do not employ tutors directly, nor guarantee the outcome of any tutoring sessions.
Be at least 13 years old to create an ac: Be at least 13 years old to create an account.
Maintain confidentiality of their login: Maintain confidentiality of their login credentials.
Understand that false information may le: Understand that false information may lead to account suspension.
Use your real name or known teaching nam: Use your real name or known teaching name.
Provide a clear description of your cour: Provide a clear description of your course:
Price per session or monthly subscriptio: Price per session or monthly subscription.
Whether sessions are online or in-person: Whether sessions are online or in-person.
Teachers are responsible for their liste: Teachers are responsible for their listed times.
In case of cancellation, students must b: In case of cancellation, students must be informed well in advance.
Repeated absences or lateness may lead t: Repeated absences or lateness may lead to suspension.
Students can leave reviews after each se: Students can leave reviews after each session or month.
Reviews affect your ranking on the platf: Reviews affect your ranking on the platform.
Repeated poor ratings will result in inv: Repeated poor ratings will result in investigation or removal.
Teachers receive payments per session or: Teachers receive payments per session or monthly based on agreement.
A 50 EGP monthly subscription to Modares: A 50 EGP monthly subscription to Modaresy is required (first month is free).
Modaresy does not interfere with or hold: Modaresy does not interfere with or hold teacher-student payments.
Teachers are fully responsible for any e: Teachers are fully responsible for any educational materials shared.
Plagiarism, copyright violations, abusiv: Plagiarism, copyright violations, abusive content, or anything illegal is strictly forbidden.
You may pause or close your account at a: You may pause or close your account at any time by notifying us at least one week in advance.
Must provide accurate info when requesti: Must provide accurate info when requesting lessons.
Payments between student and teacher are: Payments between student and teacher are handled independently unless otherwise specified.
Posting false, offensive, or misleading: Posting false, offensive, or misleading content.
Hacking, exploiting, or misusing the pla: Hacking, exploiting, or misusing the platform.
You retain ownership of any content you: You retain ownership of any content you upload, but grant Modaresy a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use and distribute it as part of the service.
Modaresy is provided \"as is.\" We do no: Modaresy is provided "as is." We do not guarantee lesson quality or outcomes. Modaresy is not liable for disputes, lost payments, or academic performance.
We reserve the right to suspend or termi: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate any account that violates our terms or harms the platform's integrity.
These terms may be updated. Continued us: These terms may be updated. Continued use after updates means you accept the changes.

name: Name

heroSection.title:
Get the tutor you want,
with just one click.
heroSection.subtitle: Browse hundreds of top-rated teachers in every subject. No stress, no limits. just results.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.statement: Creating a truly competitive market between tutors
vision.description: One that values the quality of explanation and education—not just popularity—to fight exploitation, ease student stress, and show compassion to parents.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.statement: Empowering good educators and guiding students
mission.description: We aim to highlight competent teachers and connect them with students seeking high-quality learning—beyond the limits of fame-based perception.

location.title: Tutors Near You
location.description: Easily find tutors close to your area.

affordability.title: Affordable for Everyone
affordability.description: High-quality lessons at prices that fit all budgets.

flexibility.title: Flexible Scheduling
flexibility.description: Choose from different time slots that suit your routine.

accessibility.title: Easy Access
accessibility.description: You can evaluate your future teacher by watching some of his introductory videos

freeAdvertising.title: Free Advertising
freeAdvertising.description: Modaresy promotes your profile to students for free—no paid ads or commissions.

noRisk.title: No Risk Involved
noRisk.description: You don’t pay or commit to anything. Just create your profile and let students find you.

winWin.title: A Win-Win Opportunity
winWin.description: You gain exposure and students get more choices. Everyone wins.

standOut.title: Stand Out Easily
standOut.description: Let your teaching quality speak for itself without needing fame or expensive marketing.

mobileComingSoon.title: Mobile Experience Coming Soon!
mobileComingSoon.description: We're working hard to bring you a smooth, full-featured mobile version of Modaresy. Stay tuned for updates!

roles.idk but i love him too: Not sure, but I love him too

bios.Full Card Name: Obsessed with everything programming—from infrastructure to interactive interfaces. Always chasing the latest trends and aiming to change the world.
